metadata.title: JAMSTEC Ocean General Circulation Model for the Earth Simulator (OFES)
metadata.description: To study ocean currents and eddies as well as ocean circulation at global scale. To make contribution in the study of the ocean general circulation, and further for studies on climate change including global warming, affected by the variation in the ocean general circulation.
metadata.notes:
